page.title: 13Motor-cycle scrambling
page.content:
A family who live in Fenny Drayton are fanatics of motor-cycle scrambling. The eldest son Kevin has won more than a hundred trophies. They have several motor-cycles, which they transport in a big van. They go scrambling every week, and they have been all over the world.
A motor-cycle scramble is a competition to see who can ride a motor-cycle fastest over a course of rough terrain. This family classify the scrambling tracks as:
"sandy", "muddy" or "dusty" "fast" or "slow" "tight" or "wide"
